sentences.en: a growth hormone
sentences.cn: 生长激素

sentences.en: a means of stimulating plant growth
sentences.cn: 刺激植物生长的方法

sentences.en: But change brought about the growth and consolidation of the working class.
sentences.cn: 但是变革使得工人阶级发展壮大起来。

sentences.en: Cells divide and renew as part of the human growth process.
sentences.cn: 细胞不断地分裂更新，这是人体发育过程的一部分。

sentences.en: Computers and electronics are growth industries and need skilled technicians.
sentences.cn: 计算机与电子行业属于蓬勃发展的产业，需要娴熟的技术人员。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentences.cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentences.en: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.cn: 刺激经济增长的措施

sentences.en: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
sentences.cn: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

sentences.en: Sewage nutrients do increase algal growth in the harbour.
sentences.cn: 污水中的营养物确实会加快港口的海藻生长。

sentences.en: The changed outlook entails higher economic growth than was previously assumed.
sentences.cn: 观念的改变势必会使得经济增长高于之前预计的水平。

sentences.en: The company is preparing for zero growth (= no growth ) this year.
sentences.cn: 公司今年准备面对零增长。

sentences.en: The economy is expanding, notching up high growth rates.
sentences.cn: 经济在发展，实现了高增长率。

sentences.en: The evidence that such investment promotes growth is strong.
sentences.cn: 有充分的证据表明这种投资能够促进增长。

sentences.en: The harshness of the climate makes vegetative growth extremely slow.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的气候使植物生长特别缓慢。

sentences.en: The heart condition had stunted his growth a bit.
sentences.cn: 心脏病已经多少影响了他的成长。

sentences.en: There has been a sharp slowdown in economic growth.
sentences.cn: 经济增长的速度明显放慢。

sentences.en: There has been consistent growth in GSM mobile subscribers.
sentences.cn: 全球通手机用户持续增长。

sentences.en: Vitamins are essential for healthy growth.
sentences.cn: 维生素是健康成长所必需的。

sentences.en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentences.cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

words.tran_cn: 长大的；成年的；长满某物的
生长；变成；栽培（grow的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 增长因子；增长系数；放大因子；经济增长因素
n. [生化]生长激素；[生化]植物生长素
强劲增长；强劲的增长势头

trans.tran_cn: 发展，增加，成长，新生发的植株，肿瘤，赘生物，产物
trans.tran_en: an increase in amount, number, or size
